tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_medical_records (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  address TEXT,
  test_results JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender CHAR(1),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE TestResults (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  result_value FLOAT,
  test_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  height DECIMAL(5, 2),
  weight DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  test_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  test_date DATE,
  result_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
  consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  consultant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  consultation_date TIMESTAMP,
  consultation_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  prescription TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TestResults (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  test_date DATE,
  result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    diagnosis TEXT,
    medications TEXT,
    prescription_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TestResults (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id UUID REFERENCES MedicalRecords(record_id),
    test_type VARCHAR(50),
    test_date DATE,
    result_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Teleconsultations (
    consultation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    consultation_date DATE,
    consultation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
    doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialist_area VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)
